articles.title: Samsung’s next big leap in camera tech may take longer than you think - PhoneArena

articles.content: Samsung might not bring any major camera hardware upgrades to its flagship phones until the Galaxy S28. Thats according to a (now deleted) claim from reliable tipster Ice Universe, who says the Galax… [+2212 chars]
